TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Mamahavunna, title = Mamahavunna, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mamahavunna} }

S.FORM: alang Mahavun (Mamahavunna, 久美部落) ga niya mki sku Nanto Keng atu Sin'iy go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 256 buwan, 943 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 88% kyan ku 830 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 12% kyan ku 113 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Bunun 69%, Cou 15%, Tayan 2%, Amis 1%.

alang Mahavon (Mamahavonna, 久美部落) ga niya mki sko Nanto Keng ato Sin'iy go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 256 bowan, 943 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 88% kyan ko 830 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 12% kyan ko 113 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Bonon 69%, Coo 15%, Tayan 2%, Amis 1%.
